ratio constat is said of an account when properly balanced. Hence it comes to be used of anything that can be approved of, or has good grounds for its existence, or can be satisfactorily accounted for. Catan. says ratio constabilzerit lesyilima causa. constal enim ratio quando aequa ec leqitima reddi potest, and he quotes from Valer.
